ModMetaData.name: [T] MoreFloors
ModMetaData.author: Telkir
ModMetaData.description:
Adds a wide selection of new flooring to decorate your colony with.
● Six new styles of wooden flooring (plus straw floors for that barn feel) ● Five new styles of stone flooring in all five stone colours (for a total of 25 new stone floors) ● Eight styles of chequered stone floor in various combinations ● Six new cloth carpet colours - orange, yellow, turquoise, purple, black, and white ● New checkered carpet style in all colours ● New wool carpet style in all colours using wool cloth, woven at the added loom workbench ● Two new late-game floors made using plasteel and jade
Note: The new types of stone flooring only become available to build once the Stonecutting research project has been completed.
